Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Even the latest shuttle of Babylonia will still inevitably experience intense vibration when struck by sudden turbulence.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Does this guy even know how to fly a shuttle?! My brain is getting all screwed up! I'll make a better pilot!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unable to endure any longer, Noctis finally explodes, complaining loudly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Member A', 3: "Hah, you wish... If you run away, we'll have one more defector to hunt. Don't increase our workload.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The Purifying Force member's comment stirs up more chuckles inside the cabin."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hah... Want me to beat you up, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as Noctis is about to walk up and punch him in the face, another Purifying Force member nearby gently intervenes.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "Alright, that's enough. Don't forget the Gray Raven Commandant is also here...", 4: '2'}
{2: "Don't worry about me... I'm just hitching a ride.", 3: '26'}
{3: 'Lee and Liv are both in Constellia helping the Engineering Force to repair the damage from previous battles.'}
{3: 'Meanwhile, Gray Raven will also be representing Babylonia to meet the local mechanoids, as well as the first batch of residents relocating there. You are on your way to merge with them.'}
{3: "You just happen to be on the same shuttle together. As an outsider, you do not really have anything to say about the Purifying Force's internal affairs..."}
{2: "We're comrades after all. Be nice to each other if you can.", 3: '33'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Purifying Force member sighs and gives Noctis a hostile look, but finally quiets down.'}
{2: 'Purifying Force Member A', 3: 'I was just joking. Does he have to...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Frustrated, Noctis also sits down with his arms crossed.'}
{3: 'After the Control Court made their final decision, Noctis was forced to leave Cerberus unsurprisingly. He is once again a member of the Purifying Force that he served before.'}
{3: 'The penalty seemed somewhat lackluster for the level of investigation. Perhaps Noctis was never the target of the Control Court to begin with... Or, someone helped him behind the back.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Didn't expect you to know these guys so well.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Compared to the last time Noctis served in the Purifying Force, he hardly knows any of the members now. At least not in the shuttle.'}
{2: 'I only met them once. You were there too.', 3: '45'}
{3: 'Perhaps because you once fought together when Bianca was trapped in Copperfield Aquarium, the Purifying Force members are a lot nicer to you than Noctis.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "How modest of you... I wasn't at Copperfield Aquarium, but from what I heard, if not for you, all the Purifying Force there would never have survived.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "I'm so lucky to have met you today. The name's Daemon.", 4: '1'}

{3: 'The Purifying Force member who calls himself Daemon extends his hand toward you. Compared to other Purifying Force members who are usually silent and reticent, he seems a lot easier to deal with.'}
{2: '(Shake the hand)', 3: '52'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After Daemon pulls his hand back, he reaches out to Noctis again.'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: "Just like this commandant said, since we are comrades for now, shouldn't we try to get along with each other?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis glances at him and sneers, showing no intention of shaking his hand back.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Daemon, huh? I've no interest in getting along with you... We just happen to be on the same mission. Knowing each other's names is more than enough.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Daemon's expression freezes for a split second, his hand trembling slightly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: "He's right, Daemon... We don't need to get along with him. Even though he's now assigned to the Purifying Force, we are essentially watching him.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Another member spoke up. You remember him as you once fought alongside each other in the battle at Copperfield Aquarium.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Issarius casts a sharp gaze toward Noctis, who stares back in return without holding back.'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'If we notice anything unusual about you, we will consider you a top-level threat and finish you off immediately.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hah, should I feel honored then?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: "I learned about your past in the Purifying Force from Captain Bianca... Rest assured that I'll always be keeping an eye on you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You have no idea what happened between Noctis and the Purifying Force, but he clearly has stopped smiling after hearing those words.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Tch... Whatever. What are we doing today anyway?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Daemon', 3: "Did you not listen to Captain's mission briefing before we headed out...?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Like I care... We are just going after a Kurono test subject who escaped from that Con-something city, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Should I stay away from this?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'No need, Gray Raven Commandant. In fact, we could probably use some advice from you since you are also aware of what happened.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Issarius turns on the projection function of his terminal and shares the location with everyone.'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'After the target disappeared in Constellia, there have been sightings in the nearby conservation area... But we have received no casualty reports so far.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'In fact, according to the eyewitnesses, they seemed to have received help from our target.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'She sounds like a decent one then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: "Maybe, but we won't lower her threat level just because of some nice things she did.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'That is right. Putting subjective factors aside, there is still something worth noting.'}
{2: 'Why would she head toward populated places?', 3: '95'}

{3: 'If she wants to run from the Purifying Force, she should stay away from the conservation area to avoid leaving traces. She is more than capable of protecting herself against the wandering Corrupted in the wilderness.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Now that you mention it, it does feel weird... Hey, you really are smart!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: "That's a blind spot we didn't notice. Commandant, could you elaborate?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I think she has a reason to get in contact with those conservation area refugees.', 3: '102'}
{3: 'The conservation area is home to refugees from all nearby areas, as well as surface defense soldiers. Both groups are highly transient.'}
{2: "She might be investigating something... That's just my thought.", 3: '104'}

{3: "Some of those people know the surface even better than Babylonia's intelligence department. Now that girl has left Babylonia... If she wants to investigate something, the conservation area is her only option."}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'I see. Once we arrive at the destination, we will do what we can to investigate the local residents.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "So we are not here for a fight. That's none of my business then...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: "It's not up to you to decide. You can only obey the orders given to you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis makes a sigh of disdain. He then glances at the coordinates on the image projected from the terminal.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Wait, these coordinates... Is there a town named "New Oakley" about 300 kilometers to the east?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Issarius has keenly sensed Noctis' unusual interest in the town."}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'What are you up to...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Just trying to understand the mission target, duh. Isn't that what you guys told me to? Fine, I'm out. Just call me when we arrive.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis crosses his legs scornfully, but he keeps staring at the coordinates out of the corner of his eye.'}
{3: 'Noctis pretends to close his eyes and zone out, but he is clearly thinking about something. This action itself is a very rare sight... You feel a little worried.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "You're hitching a Purifying Force shuttle to the surface in a few days, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'How do you know...?', 3: '129'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Don't answer my question with another one. Yes or no?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yes, but just out of a convenient coincidence.', 3: '131'}

{3: 'The Purifying Force hardly moves together with other forces as their mission locations are usually classified. Still, this mission just happened to be relatively public, so it did not matter much.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Noctis is also in the Purifying Force now. If you ever see him doing anything abnormal...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Anything that seems off to you. Try to stop him from doing anything dangerous if possible.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera is still wearing the same hard, distant look, but somehow, you feel she is a little relieved.'}
{2: 'Are you worried about him?', 3: '138'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Worried...? Not really. Guess I just don\'t want my handy "weapon" to break.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vera's gaze becomes sharp again. You know what she is about to say next is all serious."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'If you cannot stop that fool, just stay away from him... Did I make myself clear?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I mean... Sometimes you seem even more oblivious to danger than No. 21 and me.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{3: 'You take a glance at the map. The shuttle is not far away from the conservation area. Other Purifying Force members are quietly discussing their plans after reaching the destination.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noctis, on the other hand, still keeps his eyes closed and pretends to be dozing off. He seems not interested in the discussion at all.'}
{3: "Everything seems okay... Until Noctis' eyes become wide open with confusion."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey! Do you smell something?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Purifying Force Member A', 3: "Stop it! I've had enough of your nonsense! Stop getting on our nerves!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noctis seems to completely ignore his words. He just keeps sniffing around in the cabin.'}
{2: 'Noctis? Is everything alright?', 3: '164'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "The smell! Hey! Can't you feel it? This familiar smell...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis suddenly widens his eyes and shouts anxiously.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Get down—!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory295.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'His words are overwhelmed by a loud bang that sweeps through the entire cabin...'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Commandant... Hey...'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory338.jpg', 3: '0.5', 4: '0.5', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Opening your eyes abruptly, you find yourself lying on a makeshift "bed" made from the shuttle\'s cushions and rags. With one knee on the ground, Issarius is gazing at you.'}
{2: 'What just happened...?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Spine... All good. No visible wounds on the body...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Issarius reaches out to you and helps you slowly get up on your feet.'}
{2: "I'm good. What happened...?", 3: '197'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'An explosion took place in the shuttle. The cause is still unknown... We had to crash-land with whatever was left. Fortunately, almost no one got injured.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Noctis... had gone missing.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'At this moment, the blue-haired Purifying Force member walks to Issarius and shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: "There are no signs of external attacks on the shuttle's outer surface... Which means the explosion originated from inside.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Daemon', 3: "We investigated the residue at the center of the explosion. It matches the explosives in Noctis' personal equipment that he declared earlier on. He also bragged... I mean, reported that he was the only one who knew the formula.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'What he meant was fairly obvious—Noctis was the culprit behind the explosion.'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'Why would he do that though? We still have no clue...', 4: '1'}
{3: "You recall Vera's warning... Perhaps Noctis really had his reason to leave Babylonia, even at the cost of defecting."}
{3: 'But regardless of whether you want to help or stop him... You must find him first.'}
{2: 'Do we have contact with Babylonia?', 3: '210'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: "We tried. The shuttle's communicator was damaged, and our personal devices suffered from strong interference. I'm afraid we won't be able to contact Babylonia for a while.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Daemon', 3: "We're still quite far away from the destination... Along the way, there's also an area where positioning systems don't really work. Walking there is probably not going to be practical.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: "There's still a light transport vehicle in the shuttle. It can only carry one Construct though... Maybe one more human if you can squeeze a little.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Issarius looks at you and nods.'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: "We can't let Gray Raven Commandant be stuck here with us... At least we need to find a comms station that can reach Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Daemon seems to recall something and opens his paper notebook.'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: "I was here not long ago. If I recall correctly, there's a small town about 50 kilometers from here. We should be able to find some long-distance comms device there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Do you still remember the way there?', 3: '218'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: 'Yeah. I can find it even without navigation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: "I see. Given it's not that far from here, you can take Gray Raven Commandant with you and seek help. The rest of us will stay here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: 'No problem... What if we meet Noctis half-way?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Issarius', 3: 'You can attack without warning.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: "Understood. I'll get us ready.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'When Daemon turns away, there seems to be a meaningful grin on his face... You do not know if this is just your delusion.'}
